meanings.definition: A plant of the pea family with blue flowers, native to Texas.
meanings.sent1: The bluebonnet in the field looked beautiful.
meanings.sent2: Texans love to see bluebonnets blooming in the spring.
meanings.sent3: The bluebonnet whispered to the other flowers, 'I'm the prettiest of all.'
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like a field of bluebonnets in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The bluebonnet's petals danced in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: A blue-flowered plant of the pea family, native to Texas.
meanings.sent1: I picked a bluebonnet to give to my friend.
meanings.sent2: The bluebonnet's color brightened up the garden.
meanings.sent3: The bluebonnet chuckled, 'I'm the bluest flower around.'
meanings.sent4: His tie matched the bluebonnet perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The bluebonnet stood out among the greenery with its vibrant hue.
